• Deployed a secure repository and infrastructure on AWS for storing hardening scripts , complemented by a Python-based GUI implementation integrating CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment and testing
  • Developed an AI-powered automation tool for automating vulnerability assessments, security audits, and zero-day threat alerts integrating Nessus and Nmap with NIST NVD API, enabling real-time CVEs correlation and risk protection.
  • Implemented network automation features such as dynamic VLAN creation, automated TLS certificate renewal, and proxy configuration for secure connectivity

• Implemented enterprise-scale SIEM solution using ELK Stack, processing 100,000+ daily logs with custom detection rules aligned to MITRE ATT&CK framework, and integrated SOAR platforms to automate incident response workflows.
  • Managed global client network infrastructures in a 24/7 SOC role, specializing in zero-trust architecture and SASE SD-WAN models troubleshooting to handle escalations.
  • Configured on-prem, WAFs and Proxy - Cisco, Checkpoint, Fortinet, Palo Alto and Zscalar to provide Secure Network design, Network segmentation, URL Filtering, SSL Inspection, Load Balancing, Threat hunting, Intrusion Detection and Prevention (IDS/IPS).
  • Conducted deep-packet inspection and network traffic analysis using tools like Splunk, Sentinel, QRadar, Cisco Packet Tracer, Crowdstrike and Wireshark to proactively address security incidents and monitor for indicators of compromise (IOCs).

• Co-developed the curriculum for Impact of Cybersecurity on Society, covering ethical hacking, cybersecurity frameworks, and societal implications.
  • Led student discussions on ethical hacking concepts, real-world case studies, and the impact of secure practices on privacy and security.

• Worked on configuring and troubleshooting remote access and Site-to-Site VPN authentication using SAML, SSL, LDAP and IKE.
  • Contributed to the design of secure network architectures, incorporating VLAN segmentation, zero-trust principles, and VPNs to enhance overall organizational security.
  • Implemented cloud security measures for platforms like AWS and Azure, configuring security groups, IAM policies, and monitoring with tools like Prisma Cloud.
